sentence.Network_en: If there has to be a replay we are confident of victory.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果重新比赛，我们有信心取得胜利。

sentence.Network_en: I watched a slow-motion videotape replay of his fall.
sentence.Network_cn: 我看了一遍录像带上他摔倒时的慢动作重放。

sentence.Network_en: It was an action replay of the problems of his first marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是他第一次婚姻问题的重演。

重送攻击（Replay attack），攻击者能透过监听的方式将讯息拦截或记录，于事后非法重送，试图欺骗合法装置，通过监别。 词条内 …
FS Recorder(以下称飞行模拟录像机)是一个用于微软飞行模拟的录像软件,其录像的功能比飞行模拟内置的即时重放(Instant replay)功能要强大很多。这个录像机的最大好处.

encyclopedia.content: 《重播（REPLAY）》 作者： 肯恩·格林伍德 / Ken Grimwood 译者： 陈雅馨简介 · · · · · · ◆畅销20年，经典不朽！ ◆荣登纽约时报畅销书榜、名列一生必读奇幻小说书单！ ◆亚马逊网路书店300位网友五颗星推荐，读者公认值得一读再读的经典！ ◆纽约时报畅销小说，激发许多电影、电视、小说创作！ ◆比尔墨瑞与安蒂麦道威尔主演《今天暂时停止》（Groundhog Day）的电影灵感来源！ ◆日本漫画家今泉伸二《再世英雄Replay》

entry.def: If a match between two sports teams is replayed, the two teams play it again, because neither team won the first time, or because the match was stopped because of bad weather.

example.ex: Drawn matches were replayed three or four days later.
example.tran: 没有分出胜负的比赛在三四天后重赛。

entry.def: If you replay something that you have recorded on film or tape, you play it again in order to watch it or listen to it.

example.ex: He stopped the machine and replayed the message.
example.tran: 他停下机器，重新播放了一遍信息。

entry.tran: (反复在脑海里)重放;不断想起
entry.def: If you replay an event in your mind, you think about it again and again.

example.ex: She spends her nights lying in bed, replaying the fire in her mind.
example.tran: 她好多个晚上躺在床上，不断想起火灾场面。

means.word_mean: 1. something (especially a game) that is played again
2. (television) showing again some action (especially sports action) that has been recorded on video tape

sentences.sentence: "The lawyers played back the conversation to show that their client was innocent"

means.word_mean: 3. repeat a game against the same opponent;

sentences.cn: 重放显示那是一个手球。

sentences.en: He has watched a video replay of his fall on numerous occasions.
sentences.cn: 他多次看自己跌倒时的重放录像。

sentences.en: He rewound the tape and replayed a few bits and pieces.
sentences.cn: 他倒好磁带, 又播放了几小段录音。
